name: Professional Offroad Transport Simulator
description:
Take control of a powerful machine
Sit behind the wheel of an old powerful truck and deliver your chosen cargo to the purchase point.

The narrow roads and offroad trails are filled with obstacles which you have to navigate to get to your destination, be careful not to get stuck in the mud or you may need to winch yourself free.

Load em up!Load the vehicle with cargo of your choice, transport wood, rocks, water, barrels, gravel or pallets loaded with various items. Each successful delivery will earn you money.


Upgrade your vehicles
Use your earnings to purchase new heavy machinery and excavators which will help you load and transport the goods to your destination or upgrade your existing vehicle.

A variety of vehicles to choose from
Professional Offroad Transport Simulator features two unique maps to explore as well as an array of vehicles to choose from:

  • An offroad car with a winch
  • A truck with a wood trailer and Fuel Tank
  • A 6X6 Offroad car
  • A Truck with a double trailer

The game features a freeride mode and will be updated regularly with new vehicles and expansion packs.
